about_the_game:
Since 2017, Moon VR Player has been pioneering VR video technologies and challenging what defines the best VR video player.
Today, we are proud to launch a new version of this VR video player for your headsets and computers. With a wide range of advanced features, Moon VR Video Player transforms your headset into an immersive movie theater for your virtual reality experience. But don’t let its sophistication deter you— it also comes with a simple and intuitive interface that enables you to easily watch all your VR videos!

Unlock the best potential of VR videos with:
-Multiple video stereo modes supported and automatically recognized: 180°/ 360°/ 2D/ 3D
-Multiple video formats supported: mkv/ mp4/ wmv/ mov/ avi/ rmvb/ flv
-Multiple subtitles and audio tracks from external sources supported
-Fix ghosting: remove faulty ghosting in the video
-Head tracking control: effortless hands-free control
-Screen adjustments: Brightness, distance, zoom, and curved display
-Rotate, mirror and single-eye viewing: watch videos from perspective you like
-Background environments: galaxy, sea view and more other options to be released
-Advanced antialiasing to smooth shaking: Multisampling Antialiasing, Supersampling Antialiasing, and Subpixel Morphological Antialiasing

Ready to have your immersive virtual reality experience with us? Chill and enjoy, dear friend!

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11

  • VR Support: OpenXR

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-3770 equivalent or greater
